div.div: Relationship between morphological difference and elevational overlaps for sympatric congeneric sister species pairs.
div.p: (a) Spatial co-occurrence; t = 2.59, df = 32, p = 0.014, r 2 = 0.17. (b) Range-size corrected elevational overlap; t = 2.42, p = 0.021,r 2 = 0.15. In both cases, morphologically dissimilar species are expected to have greater overlaps in range. Open circles represent individual sympatric congeneric sister species pairs; dashed line indicates linear regression fit.
